greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular array C(n,k) counting connected k-regular simple graphs on n vertices with girth exactly 4.
link: Jason Kimberley, Index of sequences counting connected k-regular simple graphs with girth exactly g
formula: C(n,k) = A186714(n,k) - A186715(n,k), noting the differing row lengths.
E(n,k) = A185644(n,k) - A210704(n,k), noting the differing row lengths.
xref: The sum of the n-th row of this sequence is A186744(n).
Triangular arrays C(n,k) counting connected simple k-regular graphs on n vertices with girth *exactly* g: A186733 (g=3), this sequence (g=4).
Triangular arrays C(n,k) counting connected simple k-regular graphs on n vertices with girth *at least* g: A068934 (g=3), A186714 (g=4).
results.author: _Jason Kimberley_, Mar 20 2013
